title: Beautiful Golden Gate Heights Unit 2BR/1BA; Looking for Roommate
posting_body: Located on a quiet, pleasant, and scenic block in Golden Gate Heights.
This garden-level unit is situated in a fully detached home.
I moved into this unit in 2020 w/ a friend, but she has recently decided to move into a new space.
I am seeking a roommate to occupy the newly available room.
I am a 31 y/o man who works from home most days (technical recruiter).
I am also active, sober, and enjoy exploring the bay area in my downtime.
I'd ideally love to find someone who would become a friend down the line, but a respectful and clean roommate is just as welcome.
The living room is currently fully furnished with a couch, dining table, stools, and is attached to a full kitchen with all amenities (I also welcome any changes).
The room for rent has a beige wall as shown in the photos below (mine is the more 'blue' room).
- Recently remodeled (2020) 2 bedroom, 1 full bath with plenty of natural lights
- Living room fully furnished
- Private entrance
- Large and bright living/dining room with kitchen
- Granite countertops
- Good sized bedrooms (~150 sq ft.)with big closets and double-paned windows
- Hardwood floors
- Large storage area within apartment
- Mini garden area by entrance to grow your favorite herbs and plants
- Full access to large backyard
- Laundry not accessible on-site but laundry facility is only within a 5-minute drive
- Effortless street parking
- Central to all amenities: restaurants, shops, Stonestown Mall, Lakeshore Plaza, Safeway, Trader Joe, public libraries.
- Walking distance to Grandview Park (spectacular views!!!) and beautiful Moraga Steps.
~20-30 min walk to Golden Gate Park or a five minute drive
- Within 10 minute drive to UCSF, SFSU and CCSF.
Direct bus line to UCSF one block away and direct lines to SFSU and downtown 4 blocks away.
- Convenient public transportation: L-Taraval, Muni 66, 8, 28.
- Sorry, no pets, no smoking, and no recreational drugs
- Available August 1, 2022
- Shared utilities (PG&E and water)
- Looking for one-year lease, but half-year lease is also acceptable.
First month rent ($1,250) and security deposit ($1,500) to move in; (excellent credit required and references from prior landlord(s) are also required)
